name: Samuel Ndung'u Kinyanjui
title: Full-Stack Developer & Cybersecurity Enthusiast
summary: As an aspiring security analyst and full-stack developer, I bring a deep passion for protecting organizations and individuals from cyber threats while creating innovative web solutions. My expertise spans incident response, risk management, and security monitoring, combined with strong full-stack development skills. I am adept at performing vulnerability assessments, identifying potential risks, and providing mitigation strategies to safeguard systems and data.

experience.title: Student Developer
responsibilities: Collaborate on full-stack development projects, enhancing both frontend and backend skills
Implement security best practices in web application development
Participate in code reviews and contribute to improving overall code quality
